dmca.title: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Sunday, May 07, 2006 7:51 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
the address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] copyright infringement
Date:         Sat, 6 May 2006 11:53:20 -0700
From:         Mistress Crystal <sessions@la-crystal.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Your customer mydeviantdesires.com, a porn website, has numerous
copyrighted images displayed. Furthermore, their website provides no
means to contact its administrator, thus people have no recourse but to
complain to the webhost. Please address this situation by reminding the
owner of theplanet.com's AUP, specificially intellectual property
infringement. I doubt anybody would like to get attorneys involved.

Sincerely,

Crystal Davies

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEXpYCvK/XpJs6oyURArwTAJ9kNVaWZRRupNG2CZ5jMyqyKyy6NQCdFMfo
bN3O0eCr+qjA4k72s+jpVik=
=bkLK
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
